verses.verse: מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Oh יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten Oh that רֹאשִׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shi my head מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim, were waters וְעֵינִ֖י <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Ni and mine eyes מְק֣וֹר <S%H4726><s%> me-Kor a fountain דִּמְעָ֑ה <S%H1832><s%> dim-'Ah; of tears וְאֶבְכֶּה֙ <S%H1058><s%> ve-'ev-Keh that I might weep יוֹמָ֣ם <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam day וָלַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> va-Lay-lah, and night אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et חַֽלְלֵ֥י <S%H2491><s%> chal-Lei for the slain בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> vat- of the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi. of my people

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Oh יִתְּנֵ֣נִי <S%H5414><s%> yit-te-Ne-ni Oh that בַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> vam-mid-Bar, I had in the wilderness מְלוֹן֙ <S%H4411><s%> me-lOn a lodging place אֹֽרְחִ֔ים <S%H732><s%> 'o-re-Chim, of wayfaring men וְאֶֽעֶזְבָה֙ <S%H5800><s%> ve-'e-'ez-Vah that I might leave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi, my people וְאֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> ve-'e-le-Chah and go מֵֽאִתָּ֑ם <S%H853><s%> me-'it-Tam; כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki them כֻלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> chul-Lam for all מְנָ֣אֲפִ֔ים <S%H5003><s%> me-Na-'a-Fim, from them for they [be] all adulterers עֲצֶ֖רֶת <S%H6116><s%> 'a-Tze-ret an assembly בֹּגְדִֽים׃ <S%H898><s%> bo-ge-Dim. of treacherous men

וַֽיַּדְרְכ֤וּ <S%H1869><s%> vai-yad-re-Chu And they bend אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לְשׁוֹנָם֙ <S%H3956><s%> le-sho-Nam their tongues קַשְׁתָּ֣ם <S%H7198><s%> kash-Tam [like] their bow שֶׁ֔קֶר <S%H8267><s%> She-ker, [for] lies וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and not לֶאֱמוּנָ֖ה <S%H530><s%> le-'e-mu-Nah for the truth גָּבְר֣וּ <S%H1396><s%> ga-ve-Ru but they are not valiant בָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz; upon the earth כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki from מֵרָעָ֨ה <S%H7451><s%> me-ra-'Ah from evil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to רָעָ֧ה׀ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah to evil יָצָ֛אוּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-Tza-'u for they proceed וְאֹתִ֥י <S%H853><s%> ve-'o-Ti לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יָדָ֖עוּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da-'u and they know נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- not me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one מֵרֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> me-re-'E-hu of his neighbour הִשָּׁמֵ֔רוּ <S%H8104><s%> hish-sha-Me-ru, Take ye heed וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any אָ֖ח <S%H251><s%> 'ach ye not in any brother אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּבְטָ֑חוּ <S%H982><s%> tiv-Ta-chu; and trust כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol every אָח֙ <S%H251><s%> 'ach for every brother עָק֣וֹב <S%H6117><s%> a-Kov will utterly יַעְקֹ֔ב <S%H6117><s%> ya'-Ko, supplant וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and every רֵ֖עַ <S%H7453><s%> Re-a' and every neighbour רָכִ֥יל <S%H7400><s%> ra-Chil with slanders יַהֲלֹֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> ya-ha-Loch. will walk

וְאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish every one בְּרֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> be-re-'E-hu his neighbour יְהָתֵ֔לּוּ <S%H2048><s%> ye-ha-Tel-lu, And they will deceive וֶאֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> ve-'e-Met the truth לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo and does not יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Be-ru; and will not speak לִמְּד֧וּ <S%H3925><s%> lim-me-Du they have taught לְשׁוֹנָ֛ם <S%H3956><s%> le-sho-Nam their tongue דַּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> dab-ber- to speak שֶׁ֖קֶר <S%H8267><s%> She-ker lies הַעֲוֵ֥ה <S%H5753><s%> ha-'a-Veh themselves to commit iniquity נִלְאֽוּ׃ <S%H3811><s%> nil-'U. [and] weary

שִׁבְתְּךָ֖ <S%H3427><s%> shiv-te-Cha Thine habitation בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch [is] in the midst מִרְמָ֑ה <S%H4820><s%> mir-Mah; of deceit בְּמִרְמָ֛ה <S%H4820><s%> be-mir-Mah through deceit מֵאֲנ֥וּ <S%H3985><s%> me-'a-Nu they refuse דַֽעַת־ <S%H3045><s%> da-'at- to know אוֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> o-Ti נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold צוֹרְפָ֖ם <S%H6884><s%> tzor-Fam Behold I will melt וּבְחַנְתִּ֑ים <S%H974><s%> u-ve-chan-Tim; them and try כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For אֵ֣יךְ <S%H349><s%> 'eich what אֶעֱשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-Seh, them for how shall I do מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei for בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi. folk

חֵ֥ץ <S%H2671><s%> chetz [is as] an arrow; שֹׁוחֵט sho-chet כשָׁח֛וּט <S%H7819><s%> sha-Chut kill קלְשׁוֹנָ֖ם <S%H3956><s%> le-sho-Nam Their tongue מִרְמָ֣ה <S%H4820><s%> mir-Mah deceit דִבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber; it speaketh בְּפִ֗יו <S%H6310><s%> be-Fiv, with his mouth שָׁל֤וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom peaceably אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu to his neighbour יְדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber, [one] speaketh וּבְקִרְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7130><s%> u-ve-kir-Bo but in heart יָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> ya-Sim he layeth אָרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H696><s%> a-re-Bo. his wait

הַעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ha-'al- for אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not אֶפְקָד־ <S%H6485><s%> 'ef-kod- Shall I not visit בָּ֖ם bam נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- them for these [things];saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD אִ֚ם <S%H518><s%> 'im On בְּג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> be-Goy on such a nation אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- such כָּזֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> ka-Zeh, this לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תִתְנַקֵּ֖ם <S%H5358><s%> tit-nak-Kem be avenged נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi. shall not my soul ס sa-Mek

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- For הֶ֨הָרִ֜ים <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim For the mountains אֶשָּׂ֧א <S%H5375><s%> 'es-Sa will I take up בְכִ֣י <S%H1065><s%> ve-Chi a weeping וָנֶ֗הִי <S%H5092><s%> va-Ne-hi, and wailing וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and for נְא֤וֹת <S%H4999><s%> ne-'ot and for the habitations מִדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> mid-Bar of the wilderness קִינָ֔ה <S%H7015><s%> ki-Nah, a lamentation כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because נִצְּתוּ֙ <S%H3341><s%> nitz-tze-Tu because they are burned up מִבְּלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> mib-be-li- no אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish so that none עֹבֵ֔ר <S%H5674><s%> 'o-Ver, can pass וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo is not שָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U through [them] neither can [men] hear ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the voice מִקְנֶ֑ה <S%H4735><s%> mik-Neh; of the cattle מֵע֤וֹף <S%H5775><s%> me-'of both the fowl הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim of the heavens וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against בְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah, and the beast נָדְד֖וּ <S%H5074><s%> na-de-Du are fled הָלָֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> ha-La-chu. they are gone

וְנָתַתִּ֧י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem לְגַלִּ֖ים <S%H1530><s%> le-gal-Lim heaps מְע֣וֹן <S%H4583><s%> me-'on [and] a den תַּנִּ֑ים <S%H8577><s%> tan-Nim; of dragons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עָרֵ֧י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei the cities יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten and I will make שְׁמָמָ֖ה <S%H8077><s%> she-ma-Mah desolate מִבְּלִ֖י <S%H1097><s%> mib-be-Li without יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev. without an inhabitant ס sa-Mek

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who הָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish man הֶֽחָכָם֙ <S%H2450><s%> he-cha-Cham Who [is] the wise וְיָבֵ֣ן <S%H995><s%> ve-ya-Ven that may understand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> Zot, likewise וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber hath spoken פִּֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> pi- this;and [who is he] to whom the mouth יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about וְיַגִּדָ֑הּ <S%H5046><s%> ve-yag-gi-Dah; that he may declare עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and מָה֙ <S%H4100><s%> mah how long אָבְדָ֣ה <S%H6><s%> 'a-ve-Dah perisheth הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, it for what the land נִצְּתָ֥ה <S%H3341><s%> nitz-tze-Tah [and] is burned up כַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> cham-mid-Bar like a wilderness מִבְּלִ֖י <S%H1097><s%> mib-be-Li no עֹבֵֽר׃ <S%H5674><s%> 'o-Ver. that none passeth through ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- Because עָזְבָם֙ <S%H5800><s%> 'a-ze-Vam Because they have forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- תּ֣וֹרָתִ֔י <S%H8451><s%> to-ra-Ti, my law אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti which I set לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem; before וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor שָׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U them and have not obeyed בְקוֹלִ֖י <S%H6963><s%> ve-ko-Li my voice וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor הָ֥לְכוּ <S%H1980><s%> Hal-chu neither walked בָֽהּ׃ Vah.

וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-le-Chu, have walked אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after שְׁרִר֣וּת <S%H8307><s%> she-ri-Rut the imagination לִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bam; of their own heart וְאַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-Rei and after הַבְּעָלִ֔ים <S%H1168><s%> hab-be-'a-Lim, Baalim אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לִמְּד֖וּם <S%H3925><s%> lim-me-Dum taught אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam. which their fathers ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'Ot of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הִנְנִ֧י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold מַאֲכִילָ֛ם <S%H398><s%> ma-'a-chi-Lam Behold I will feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am them [even] this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this לַֽעֲנָ֑ה <S%H3939><s%> la-'a-Nah; with wormwood וְהִשְׁקִיתִ֖ים <S%H8248><s%> ve-hish-ki-Tim to drink מֵי־ <S%H4325><s%> mei- and give them water רֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7219><s%> Rosh. of gall

וַהֲפִֽצוֹתִים֙ <S%H6327><s%> va-ha-fi-tzo-Tim I will scatter בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim, them also among the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo neither יָֽדְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'U, have known הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah like וַֽאֲבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> va-'a-vo-Tam; whom neither they nor their fathers וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֤י <S%H7971><s%> ve-shil-lach-Ti and I will send אַֽחֲרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem after אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ha-Che-rev, a sword עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad until כַּלּוֹתִ֖י <S%H3615><s%> kal-lo-Ti them till I have consumed אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam. פ Peh

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts הִתְבּֽוֹנְנ֛וּ <S%H995><s%> hit-bon-Nu Consider וְקִרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> ve-kir-'U ye and call לַמְקוֹנְנ֖וֹת <S%H6969><s%> lam-kon-Not for the mourning women וּתְבוֹאֶ֑ינָה <S%H935><s%> u-te-vo-'Ei-nah; that they may come וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- for הַחֲכָמ֥וֹת <S%H2450><s%> ha-cha-cha-Mot for cunning שִׁלְח֖וּ <S%H7971><s%> shil-Chu and send וְתָבֽוֹאנָה׃ <S%H935><s%> ve-ta-Vo-nah. [women] that they may come
